description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nGem Blade:
After this creature gains {CONDNAME_MINION_ANIMATEDGEM}, it {ACTION_casts} the spell in its Artifact's Spell Slot. After this creature gains {CONDNAME_MINION_ANIMATEDWEAPON}, it {ACTION_attacks} a random enemy.
name: Silvered Steel
